programme.title: Clinton's campaign money scandal
programme.short_synopsis: President Clinton's solicitation of money from inside the White House causes a scandal.
programme.medium_synopsis: President Clinton and Vice President Al Gore have been caught soliciting money from inside the White House for use in the presidential campaign. How will the scandal unfold?
